title: Universal Visual Blueprint Schema Template
description: Universal template for documenting visual blueprints, wireframes, and UI/UX design specifications that works across any design tool, platform, or methodology. This schema provides a structured approach to visual design documentation using placeholders that can be adapted to web applications, mobile apps, desktop software, or any other digital interface. Follows modern UX design practices and wireframing standards for 2025.

blueprintInfo.description: Basic visual blueprint information and metadata

designSpecifications.description: Design specifications and guidelines using placeholders

url.description: Screen URL or route - use placeholder [SCREEN_URL]
